name: BULB!
description:
DEMO VERSION AVAILABLE!
 GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT!

:: CONTROLS ::

  • Arrow keys = Move
  • Z = Run
  • X = Jump
  • Enter = Start
  • Shift = Select

---------------------------------------

Sometimes...

The world can be a dark place...

Light up your life, 

with a little help from - BULB!

It can be tough going through life as an unplugged light bulb - When you're made of glass you got to watch carefully where you step, and learn how to take a fall...

BULB!

COMING SOON - TO A LAMP NEAR YOU
